attributes.action: non-motoring convictions removed from car insurance
attributes.additional_details: Can you please put a ban on car insurance companies asking if you have any 'non-motoring convictions'. I believe convictions that aren't in anyway related to driving should not be relevant to insurance.  It's not fair on people that might have a conviction for something really small have to pay alot more in car insurance (in some cases double).

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.
